mapper.sql: ZYID, RWDID, TO_CHAR(WGTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') WGTIME, JLUSERNAME, BMCODE, LDCODE, TQ, SZHHKM, SZHHM, EZHHKM, EZHHM, WZBC, QLCODE, QLNAME, SDCODE, SDNAME, HDCODE, HDNAME, YHID, SL, BZ, GRDE, JHGR, RGF, CLF, JXF, ZYSBZT, SBUSERNAME, TO_CHAR(SBTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') SBTIME, YSZT,HGSL

if.test: starttime != null and starttime != '' and endtime != null and endtime != ''

mapper.select: select t1.ZYID,t1.RYID,t1.WCGCL,t1.WCGR,t2.ryname from RCYH_RYZYJLB t1 left join HTGL_RYB t2 on t1.ryid = t2.ryid where ZYID = #{zyid}
select t1.SSID,t1.LXID,t1.SL,t1.DJ,t1.JE,t2.GG,nvl(t2.DW,'-') dw,t2.LXNAME,t2.BM from RCYH_CLJXXHB t1 left join HTGL_GLJLXB t2 on t1.LXID = t2.LXID where SSID = #{zyid}
select SSID,RYID,ZPMC,ZPDZ,ZPID,ZPDX,ZPMS from RCYH_ZPJLB where SSID = #{zyid}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN,TEMP.* FROM( select
from RCYH_WXZYJLB
order by WGTIME ) TEMP
where ROWNUM <= (#{page} * #{rows}) )
RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN,TEMP.* FROM( select t1.*,t2.lxcode from RCYH_WXZYJLB t1 left join HTGL_LDB t2 on t1.LDCODE = t2.LDCODE
order by t1.WGTIME ) TEMP
where ROWNUM <= (#{page} * #{rows}) )
RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})
select count(*) from RCYH_WXZYJLB t1 left join HTGL_LDB t2 on t1.LDCODE = t2.LDCODE

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN,TEMP.* FROM( select t1.yhid,t1.bmcode,sum(t1.sl) sl,sum(t1.jhgr) jhgr,min(t1.szhhkm+t1.szhhm/1000) szhh,max(t1.ezhhkm+t1.ezhhm/1000) ezhh from rcyh_wxzyjlb t1 left join htgl_bmb t2 on t1.bmcode = t2.bmcode where ldcode = #{ldcode} and wgtime >= to_date(#{starttime} || ' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd,hh24:mi:ss') and wgtime <= to_date(#{endtime} || ' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd,hh24:mi:ss') and yszt = '0' and zysbzt = '1' and t2.sftsbm = '0' group by t1.yhid,t1.bmcode ) TEMP
where ROWNUM <= (#{page} * #{rows}) )
RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

select count(*) from ( select t1.yhid,t1.bmcode,sum(t1.sl) sl,sum(t1.jhgr) jhgr,min(t1.szhhkm+t1.szhhm/1000) szhh,max(t1.ezhhkm+t1.ezhhm/1000) ezhh from rcyh_wxzyjlb t1 left join htgl_bmb t2 on t1.bmcode = t2.bmcode where ldcode = #{ldcode} and wgtime >= to_date(#{starttime} || ' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd,hh24:mi:ss') and wgtime <= to_date(#{endtime} || ' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd,hh24:mi:ss') and yszt = '0' and zysbzt = '1' and t2.sftsbm = '0' group by t1.yhid,t1.bmcode )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN,TEMP.* FROM( select t1.zyid,t1.yhid,t1.bmcode,t1.sl sl,t1.jhgr jhgr,t1.szhhkm+t1.szhhm/1000 szhh,t1.ezhhkm+t1.ezhhm/1000 ezhh from rcyh_wxzyjlb t1 left join htgl_bmb t2 on t1.bmcode = t2.bmcode where ldcode like #{ldcode} || '%' and wgtime >= to_date(#{starttime} || ' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd,hh24:mi:ss') and wgtime <= to_date(#{endtime} || ' 23:59:59' ,'yyyy-mm-dd,hh24:mi:ss') and yszt = '0' and zysbzt = '1' and t2.sftsbm = '1' ) TEMP
where ROWNUM <= (#{page} * #{rows}) )
RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

select count(*) from rcyh_wxzyjlb t1 left join htgl_bmb t2 on t1.bmcode = t2.bmcode where ldcode like #{ldcode} || '%' and wgtime >= to_date(#{starttime} || ' 00:00:00' ,'yyyy-mm-dd,hh24:mi:ss') and wgtime <= to_date(#{endtime} || ' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd,hh24:mi:ss') and yszt = '0' and zysbzt = '1' and t2.sftsbm = '1'

select
from RCYH_WXZYJLB where ldcode = #{ldcode} and yhid = #{yhid} and bmcode = #{bmcode} and wgtime >= to_date(#{starttime},'yyyy-mm-dd') and wgtime <= to_date(#{endtime},'yyyy-mm-dd') and yszt = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into hmglyh.RCYH_WXZYJLB (ZYID, RWDID, WGTIME, JLUSERNAME, BMCODE, LDCODE, TQ, SZHHKM, SZHHM, EZHHKM, EZHHM, WZBC, QLCODE, QLNAME, SDCODE, SDNAME, HDCODE, HDNAME, YHID, SL, BZ, GRDE, JHGR, RGF, CLF, JXF, ZYSBZT, SBUSERNAME, SBTIME, YSZT,HGSL,DJ) values (#{zyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{wgtime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{jlusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ldcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{szhhkm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{szhhm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ezhhkm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ezhhm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wzbc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qlcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qlname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grde,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jhgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rgf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{clf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jxf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zysbzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sbusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{yszt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{hgsl},#{dj})

insert into hmglyh.RCYH_WXZYJLB
ZYID,
RWDID,
WGTIME,
JLUSERNAME,
BMCODE,
LDCODE,
TQ,
SZHHKM,
SZHHM,
EZHHKM,
EZHHM,

QLNAME,
SDCODE,

HDCODE,
HDNAME,
YHID,
SL,
BZ,
GRDE,
JHGR,
RGF,
CLF,
JXF,
ZYSBZT,
SBUSERNAME,
SBTIME,
YSZT, ,
GJ,
#{zyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rwdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
to_date(#{wgtime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
#{jlusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bmcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ldcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{szhhkm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{szhhm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{ezhhkm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{ezhhm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{wzbc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qlcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qlname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{grde,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{jhgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{rgf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{clf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{jxf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{zysbzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{sbusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sbtime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{yszt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{hgsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{dj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update hmglyh.RCYH_WXZYJLB
RWDID = #{rwdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WGTIME = to_date(#{wgtime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
JLUSERNAME = #{jlusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BMCODE = #{bmcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LDCODE = #{ldcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TQ = #{tq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SZHHKM = #{szhhkm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SZHHM = #{szhhm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EZHHKM = #{ezhhkm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EZHHM = #{ezhhm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WZBC = #{wzbc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QLCODE = #{qlcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QLNAME = #{qlname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDCODE = #{sdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDNAME = #{sdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HDCODE = #{hdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HDNAME = #{hdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YHID = #{yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SL = #{sl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRDE = #{grde,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JHGR = #{jhgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RGF = #{rgf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLF = #{clf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JXF = #{jxf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZYSBZT = #{zysbzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SBUSERNAME = #{sbusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SBTIME = to_date(#{sbtime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
YSZT = #{yszt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
hgsl = #{hgsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
dj = #{dj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ZYID = #{zyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update hmglyh.RCYH_WXZYJLB set RWDID = #{rwdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WGTIME = to_date(#{wgtime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), JLUSERNAME = #{jlusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BMCODE = #{bmcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LDCODE = #{ldcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TQ = #{tq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SZHHKM = #{szhhkm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SZHHM = #{szhhm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EZHHKM = #{ezhhkm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EZHHM = #{ezhhm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WZBC = #{wzbc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QLCODE = #{qlcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QLNAME = #{qlname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDCODE = #{sdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDNAME = #{sdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HDCODE = #{hdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HDNAME = #{hdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHID = #{yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SL = #{sl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRDE = #{grde,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JHGR = #{jhgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RGF = #{rgf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLF = #{clf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JXF = #{jxf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZYSBZT = #{zysbzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SBUSERNAME = #{sbusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SBTIME = to_date(#{sbtime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), YSZT = #{yszt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HGSL = #{hgsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DJ = #{dj,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ZYID = #{zyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
